name: certification

the process of earning an official document, or the act of providing an official document, as proof that something has happened or been done: He earned certification to fly single-engine aircraft. Fairtrade is a certification that guarantees producers in the developing world are paid a fair price for their crops. a programme for the certification of X-ray technicians See

the process of giving official or legal approval to a person, company, product, etc. that has reached a particular standard: certification in sth The new division received $10,000 in training funds that will help staff gain certification in insurance procedures.certification as sth Our products were awarded certification as compliant with all the relevant standards.
